page.title: 20Saturday mornings-C.Walkley
page.content: On a Saturday morning I get up at 9.30 because I have a piano lesson at 10.30.When I am dressed I have my breakfast. I have Coco Pops cereal and a croissant for my breakfast.I then go and feed my fish called Yorkie.He eats a fish food called "Fish Flakes". Then I go and feed my rabbit.He is called Snoopy and he has white fur.He has a plastic cover over his hutch in case it rains.His hutch is in the back garden behind our house.Then I go inside and look at my fish Yorkie in his fish tank on our breakfast bar.A breakfast bar is where we eat our breakfast.Our dog Duke is wagging his tail at me. Then I get my coat on, say goodbye to my Mum and go to my piano lesson. {The Domesday Project texts were {written by various eight, nine and ten {year olds who go to Captains Close Sch
